Transcription for 1896771

To me, I equated to conform with having an easy life.
And also you learn how to dodge things if you can.
However, I did think I am doing it for a purpose.
I think this is something which may be endemic in people like myself.
You know you were fighting for a cause.
And therefore everything you did was for the benefit, you were idealistic in a way.
I had this idealistic thought in my mind that everything I performed and everything I did
was for the benefit of society and intimately, of course inclusive yourself.
If you want to defeat Hitler, you had to do that.
And that is something which prompted me, which motivated me.
